artists.name: Claude Monet
artists.biography: Claude Monet was a French painter, a founder of French Impressionist painting and the most consistent and prolific practitioner of the movement's philosophy of expressing one's perceptions before nature.

artists.name: Pierre-Auguste Renoir
artists.biography: Renoir was a leading painter in the development of the Impressionist style, celebrated for his vibrant light and saturated color.

artists.name: Camille Pissarro
artists.biography: A key Impressionist painter, Camille Pissarro was known for his landscapes and contributions to both Impressionism and Post-Impressionism.

artworks.title: Water Lilies 23
artworks.description: A series of approximately 250 oil paintings depicting Monet's flower garden at Giverny.

artworks.title: Dance at Le Moulin de la Galette
artworks.description: One of Impressionism's most celebrated masterpieces, depicting a lively outdoor scene in Montmartre.

artworks.title: The Boulevard Montmartre on a Winter Morning
artworks.description: This painting captures the bustling activity of the Paris streets with the soft winter light filtering through the trees.

artworks.title: Impression, Sunrise
artworks.description: The painting that gave Impressionism its name, Monet's depiction of the Le Havre port is atmospheric and groundbreaking.

artworks.title: Garden at Sainte-Adresse
artworks.description: Monet's 1867 work featuring a vibrant garden and the sea in the background, showcasing his early development of the Impressionist style.

artworks.title: Le d√©jeuner des canotiers
artworks.description: Renoir's depiction of a leisurely lunch by a group of Renoir's friends is a snapshot of life with vibrant light and color.

artworks.title: Orchard in Bloom, Louveciennes
artworks.description: Showcasing Pissarro's love for nature, this painting features a lush orchard in full bloom, representing the essence of rural life.

artworks.title: Red Roofs, Corner of a Village, Winter
artworks.description: This work captures the vivid colors of a rustic village scene under a winter sky, showcasing Pissarro's skill in landscape painting.
